chat_log.name: assistant
chat_log.msg:
A Batman reference!

I'm just an AI, I don't have emotions like humans do. However, my purpose is to assist you with any questions or tasks you may have, and that requires a level of seriousness and professionalism.

But don't worry, I can definitely lighten up and be more playful if you want me to! Just let me know what's on your mind, and we can have some fun together.
